title: Science and Social Justice with David Crosby
description: Neil deGrasse Tyson talks about science fiction, folk music and social justice with rock and roll legend and science geek David Crosby. Chuck Nice co-hosts, Thomas Sugrue provides historical context for the 1960s, and Bill Nye praises “People Power” and “The Pill.”
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
